basic.floral_language:
Ficus elastica 
Floriography: prudent, loyal, love.
The rubber fig is a large tree with stout trunk. Leaves are long thick oval, dark green. It is unusually placed in hall way, living room and study room for decoration.
The plant is partial shade tolerant. Direct bright sunlight should be avoided in summer. Three to four hours of sunbath in winter is enough for growth. White flowers bloom in May to June if growing well.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers in May-June, white flowers
basic.color: Leaf color dark green to red brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, avoid strong direct light in summer, in winter may take 3-4h sunlight
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, spray frequently to the air or leaves to keep moist in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead, yellowish and disease leaves timely
